mapper.insert: insert into SEARCH_KEYWORD (AGE, CARD_TYPE, COMMUNICATION, RESTAURANT, MART, BEAUTY, GASSTATION, FASTFOOD, SUPERMARKET, BOOKSTORE, MOVIE, CAFETERIA, ONLINESHOPPING, ACADEMY, TRANSPORTATION, CAFE, CONVENIENCE, AMUSEMENTPARK, MEDICAL) values (#{age}, #{cardType}, #{communication}, #{restaurant}, #{mart}, #{beauty}, #{gasStation}, #{fastFood}, #{superMarket}, #{bookstore}, #{movie}, #{cafeteria}, #{onlineShopping}, #{academy}, #{transportation}, #{cafe}, #{convenience}, #{amusementPark}, #{medical})
